data.title: Best Spa and Massage Ever
data.text: This spa is amazing, I LOVE IT!  Sunnie has Magic Hands!! She is the best massage therapist in the world, literally. I've had many massages and have some injuries that she was able to work with and made me feel like a million bucks with no pain at all. I have had massages all over and never have had a massage help with pain, tension, stress and relaxation as much as the one I received from Sunnie. In fact I drove my husband from Denver the following day to also get a massage from her. He also had the same wonderful experience with her! I plan to drive from Denver to Colorado Springs on a monthly basis to see Sunnie at MX Spa. Rhapsody at the front desk is also very nice and knows how to treat people and initiate the relaxation process. Thank you all so much and see you soon!

data.title: Best day I've had in a while!
data.text: This is an amazing establishment. The staff are knowledgeable and friendly. I had a body scrub and 80-minute facial that was probably the best facial I've ever had. The facilities are beautiful and clean. I finished my day off with a manicure that was lovely as well. I highly recommend this spa - you will not be disappointed!

data.title: A day all to myself!
data.text: From the moment I arrived, I knew this was going to be a great experience.  The staff is friendly and very accommodating, the surrounding very calming. Tim is one of the best masseurs I have met.  I have had massages all over the world and he is by far one of the best.  From the first five minutes after asking me questions pertaining to my particular needs, he pinpointed the exact trouble spot and began carefully working to stretch me to relieve the pain. Monica is a great esthetician and listened to my concerns regarding my skin sensitivity. My skin felt great. All in all, a great day. I can't wait to return!

data.title: Mini massage
data.text: I am in awe of Tim's abilities as a massuse.  He takes the time to really listen to whatever your issues are.  I've had 2 mini massages with Tim to date and each time he's spot on with providing me relief.  MXSpa is fortunate to have such a dedicated and extraordinarily talented massuse.  Just wanted to give MXSpa and Tim a shout out! He is more knowledgeable than any other massuse I've ever had in the past.  Thank you Tim.  Pain free!!!

data.title: Perfect!
data.text: My oxygen facial exceeded my expectations! Everything was explained to start with and I was allowed to relax. Everything was positive and my face glowed after we were done. The ambiance was exactly what you think of when you mention a spa. Perfect!

data.title: First time visit
data.text:
This was the first time I tried the XM.   I had a massage, facial, manicure and pedicure.
Tim was my Massuse. I went in with the desire to have a relaxing massage, but after a brief intake with him it was suggested that I might benefit from a more aggressive massage.....am I GLAD I went with his suggestion. I was hurting before I went in, but after an hour with him, I was more energize, relaxed and in better shape than before my appointment.   The facial balanced out the sports massage, and had me on the verge of going to sleep!!!  It's been three days and my face is still soft and glowing.

Unusually by the time your ready for your pedi and mani, you end up losing all that work, because others are squawking instead of enjoying the experience. Not so this day.
I sat back in a massage chair and turned on the massage function and heard water and music.......aaaaaaaaaaaahhhhh this is nice....  Afterwards I headed for my manicure.
I had previously had a full set put on else where for my daughters wedding and regretted it, they ruined my nails.  I don't know how they did it, but they removed them, the ridges they left and the damage and left over material, and made my nails look smooth clean and fresh.   

Overall they did a wonderful job of making my trip a nice one.  Thanks mx.

data.title: Sauna/Steam
data.text: Spent a cold and rainy weekend camping out in the Crestone area, and desperately needed some steam to soothe my sore muscles before my flight out. I was staying at the Antler hotel, so for $25 could use the sauna and steam room. For the three hours I was there, I was the only guy in the place. The steam room is spacious, with seating for 4-5 people. There was a eucalyptus spray bottle outside the door so you could add it as needed. The sauna was a two-person infrared type. Temp could be controlled by the user. There were two showers with good heads and pressure for cooling off after each round of heat. In the future, I'll stay at the Antler or the Miner's Exchange just so I can use these again.

data.title: Wonderful Spa
data.text:
This is a TRUE spa, in the heart of downtown Colorado springs.  You walk in and know this isn't a salon pretending to be a spa!

you get a locker key - and inside your locker is a robe, slippers (kinda rubberized type - for easy cleaning), and a towel.  if you need more towels they are right there when you walk inside the door.

before/after your spa treatment(s) you have a dry or wet sauna inside the mens/ladies room (so you can strip down if you want) near the towels there's two spray bottles where you can add scent (lavender or eucalyptus) to your sauna.  AND there are showers complete with soap/conditioner/shampoo for before/after treatments and or sauna.

when you are ready for your treatment, there's a waiting area with several chairs, and some water/tea.  there's a second waiting area nearby with a curtain you can pull a bit if you feel uncomfortable sitting there in just a robe.

Inside the curtained waiting room they had a "spa menu" - with food listed, so if you're there for a whole day - don't worry about leaving to get a quick bite.

I've only had a quick massage so I can't testify to their other items (facials, etc) but the massage was very relaxing.  I will be calling them soon to try out their facials.

data.title: How a Spa Should Be!
data.text: I don't usually go in for spas, but my wife scheduled a massage for me at MX Spa.  **WHAT A WONDERFUL TREAT!**  I got a workover from a man from Nepal.  Excellent!  Unlocked my shoulders after a stressful week.  Here it is a week later, and they're still unlocked!  Give yourself a treat!  Go here!

data.title: Best massage EVER
data.text: After dealing with a back ache for three days prior to arriving at The Mining Exchange, I wanted a massage to make me feel better before going to my cousin's wedding.  I went down to MxSpa and was able to get an appointment. Tim not only got rid of my pain, but also gave me the best massage I ever had.  He really knows his stuff...and a has a great personality as well.  If only I could have convinced him to move to my hometown!  I'll miss you Tim!

data.title: Best massage & beautiful spa
data.text: I recently went for a ladies getaway retreat at the spa with a friend of mine that is getting married in a month.  I signed us up for hot stone massages, although I had no idea what to expect.  It was honestly the best massage that I have had in my life!  Sunny was amazing and skilled.  I often get regular massage (deep tissue) and am highly picky.  I have yet to get a massage in a spa setting that lives up to my expectations.  Needless to say, I was blown away.  Not only was she an expert with the stones, but she also worked out every bit of the tension that I had in my shoulders.  Both she and the other massage therapist (Nikki) went out of their way to make us feel pampered.  I also love that the spa served us complimentary mimosas when we arrived.  The spa is also just beautiful, with an attention to detail with the exposed brick and exquisite chandeliers.  We will definitely be back!

data.title: Serenity & Pampered Time
data.text: I needed to get away from life and experience serenity. MX spa is a beautiful and quiet spa. In the ladies locker room there's a steam room, a sauna, and showers with shampoo and body soap included. The massage therapist was experienced and even put me to sleep. I'm not into high class type of spas but...this one was worth the luxury of self care. Yes, I will return for the couple's massage.

data.title: Beautiful ambiance and excellent service
data.text: Excellent massage by Harkanwal. I'm going back! Peaceful surroundings and outstanding service with surprises.

data.title: Best spa experience in the Springs
data.text: The attention to detail, beautiful rooms and furnishings, and warmth of this new spa were pleasant surprises. Exposed brick, stone, beautiful Southwestern/Colorado photos on the walls. I had an 80-minute deep tissue massage from Nicki, and it was just what I needed. She was intuitive and skillful, and careful to ask about temperature, pressure, etc. The massage bed was heated and raises up and down, and at the end, it sits up like a chair, so you can get off more comfortably/safely. Great steam room (only small complaint is that the steam mechanism is really loud) and nice sauna. Complimentary mimosa, champagne, or wine, plus Forte teas, fruit water, nuts, etc. You're invited to stay as long as you wish. Plush robes, lockers, sandals all provided. Wonderful experience.

data.title: Luxurious and posh
data.text: atmosphere...completely posh and pampered, had everything you needed to relax...luxurious, showers, steam room, staff very accommodating, courteous and professional!

data.title: Already planning next visit!
data.text: Visited this new wonderful spa today for my husband's birthday. He had a wonderful facial with Monica, and I had an outstanding massage with Juniper. We both wished we had booked 80 minutes instead of 50 minutes. Warm welcome, wonderful surroundings, and truly talented people. We are already planning our return visit!

data.title: Day of Relaxation
data.text:
I visited the MX Spa and truly had a grand experience.  I enjoyed an Oxygen Facial, a relaxation massage, pedicure and manicure.  Was treated like royalty.  The
Spa is beautiful and well designed.  The staff was gracious and ready to meet every
request.  Loved the products available.

data.title: total comfort... luxurious stone and fine fabric
data.text: The MX Spa in The Mining Exchange hotel is incredible... the staff is knowledgeable, professional, and most importantly AMAZING at what they do. The treatments are to die for.. you have to try the opulence oxygen facial, it will make you feel refreshed without the red skin that comes after most facials. The massages are also incredible... I will definitely be coming back!
